name: Aurélien Lemesle
body:
Hi, my name is Aurélien Lemesle _"O-ray-liːn Luh-may-luh"_, not really easy to pronunce I guess.  

I'm a french student in IT/computer science in [Epitech](http://www.epitech.eu/) (European Institute of Technology) based in Paris area. As part of my 5 years program with Epitech (bachelor & master), I also studied for one year IT & Management at [Jönköping University](http://hj.se/en.html) in Sweden.  

More recently I worked in freelance with the startup [TVShow Time](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/tvshow-time-tv-guide-for-tv/id431065232?mt=8), updating their iOS projects for iPhone/iPad devices. I really liked iPad development, it is really demanding in term of conception and attention to details. Now I'm discovering the [Swift Language](https://developer.apple.com/swift/), XCode 6 and I'm looking to join another great project. 

## Education
### Epitech - European Institute of Technology
* Bachelor’s degree of Information Technology (awarded in the year 2013).  
* Master of Information Technology in Software Engineering  (2015 expected).

### Jönköping University
I was an exchange student for 2 semesters in Sweden and followed a master of Information Technology and Management in Jönköping tekniska högskolan (2012 – 2013).

## Experience

### iOS Software Engineer [@Airtag](http://airtag.com/)
I took part in the development of french mobile shopping iPhone apps: [Diadiscount](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/diadiscount/id790280731?mt=8), [Coccishop](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/coccishop/id819194884?mt=8), [Carrefour Express](https://itunes.apple.com/be/app/mon-express/id583358706?l=fr&mt=8). Building and turning the user interface and experience of those applications in the iOS 7 trends.  
Technologies used : XCode 5, Interface Builder, HockeyApp.  
(November 2013 - March 2014)

### Ruby on Rails developer [@Reunik](http://reunik.com/)
I participated in the development of a facebook web based application called [BestOfPhotos](http://www.bestofphotos.fr/) using different technologies such as Ruby on Rails, MongoDB, redis, Facebook Graph API, CoffeeScript, Haml/Sass.  
(May 2012 - August 2012) 

### Web technologies Teaching Assistant [@Sup'internet](http://supinternet.fr/)
I was a teaching assistant for students in bachelor program of a pioneering school belonging to [IONIS Education Group](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IONIS_Education_Group).  
Helping them learning how to use PHP, SQL, HTML, CSS.  
(September 2011 - July 2012)

### Ruby on Rails developer [@Custle](http://www.custle.com/)
Backend Development of Ruby on Rails applications, configuring backend jobs and host files via Amazon Web Services. 
Technologies used : Ruby on Rails, CoffeeScript, Selenium web driver, AWS SDK for Ruby, Background job processing with gem Delayed_job.  
(December 2011 - April 2012) 

### Web Developer at OXO communication
Showcase and e-commerce websites development for a web agency based in Paris. 
Technologies used : PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Prestashop, Joomla.  
(July 2010 - December 2010) 

## Side projects
[Jarriveapp](http://jarriveapp.com/) - Epitech Innovative Project  
An easy way to share your location while staying in control of your privacy.

## Skills

* Objective-C
* iOS
* Ruby
* Ruby on Rails
* iPhone Application Development
* Interface Builder
* C
* C++

## Languages
French is my native proficiency, I'm fluent in English and would be really interested to have an professional experience abroad. 
I also have a scholar level in Swedish and Spanish.

## Interests
* Software development
* Project Management
* Agile Methods
* New Technologies
* Travelling

## Contact & links
* [Send me an email](mailto:lemesle.aurelien@gmail.com)
* [My Linkedin](http://www.linkedin.com/in/aurelienlemesle/en)
* [Google+](http://google.com/+AurélienLemesle)
* [Follow me on Twitter](https://twitter.com/MrRerel)
* [My Resume (.pdf)](http://cl.ly/UAL3)
* [Mon CV en français (.pdf)](http://cl.ly/U7Bi)
* Skype : lemesle.aurelien
